LanguageData.Bullet_ThumpCannon.label: thump bomb
LanguageData.Gun_ThumpCannon.label: thump cannon
LanguageData.Gun_ThumpCannon.description: A breaching explosive launcher used by mechanoids. It fires a concussion bomb that is extremely effective against walls and structures, but does much less damage to small targets.
